snippet.title: RWBY: Arrowfell - RTX Austin Trailer
snippet.description: The action is heating up on the frozen tundra of Remnant in RWBY: Arrowfell! Switch instantly between all four members of Team RWBY - Ruby Rose, Weiss Schnee, Blake Belladonna, and Yang Xiao Long — and wield their signature weapons and Semblances in an all-new, in-continuity action-adventure set during RWBY Volume 7! Explore locations across Atlas, Mantle, and the surrounding wilderness, meet familiar characters such as Penny, Winter, and General Ironwood, and uncover clues about a mysterious new threat lurking in the shadows! Coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC in fall 2022!
